price: इन सब ने रसूलों को झुठलाया, तो मेरी यातना सिद्ध हो गई।
arabic: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: in kullun illā kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa ʿiqābi
